```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(rnoaa)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

```

```{r}
# Get a list of all NY station IDs
data("instacart") 

data_insta = instacart |>
  drop_na() |>
  filter(
    department == "snacks"
  )
  #select(order_id,reordered,order_number,order_dow,order_hour_of_day,aisle,department)
  
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Box plot
```{r}
data_insta |>
  plot_ly(
    x = ~aisle, y = ~order_number, color = ~aisle, 
    type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Scatterplot
```{r}
data_insta |> 
  #mutate(
    #text_label = 
      #str_c("Price: ", price, "\nNeighborhood: ", neighbourhood)) |> 
  #text = ~text_label,
  #
  group_by(order_hour_of_day) |>
  mutate(mean_order_number = mean(order_number)) |>
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_hour_of_day, y = ~mean_order_number, color = ~order_hour_of_day, 
    type = "scatter", mode = "markers", alpha = 0.5
  )
```


### Bar chart
```{r}
data_insta |> 
  count(aisle) |> 
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~aisle, y = ~n, 
    type = "bar")
```
